meanings.definition: A small, raised, white or yellowish blemish on the skin, typically caused by a clogged pore.
meanings.sent1: I noticed a few whiteheads on my face after not washing it properly.
meanings.sent2: She used a special cream to get rid of the whiteheads on her nose.
meanings.sent3: The whiteheads on his chin played hide and seek with the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her face looked like a constellation of whiteheads under the bright light.
meanings.sent5: The whiteheads seemed to pop up overnight like tiny snowflakes on her skin.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the Whitehead family.
meanings.sent1: One of the whiteheads arrived early for the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Whitehead family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: The whiteheads gathered for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: She felt proud to be a whitehead and carry on the family name.
meanings.sent5: Being a whitehead means having a strong bond with your relatives.
